params._proofMaxQuantityForWallet: The maximum number of NFTs an address included in an                                        allowlist can claim.
params._proofs: The proof of the claimer's inclusion in the merkle root allowlist                                        of the claim conditions that apply.
params._quantity: The quantity of NFTs to claim.
params._receiver: The receiver of the NFTs to claim.

initialize(address[],address,address,uin.details: Initializes the contract, like a constructor.

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

params.data: The bytes data that makes up the batch of function calls to execute.

returns.results: The bytes data that makes up the result of the batch of function calls executed.

verifyClaim(address,uint256,bytes32[],ui.details: Checks a request to claim tokens against the active claim condition's criteria.

claim(address,uint256,bytes32[],uint256).notice: Lets an account claim a given quantity of NFTs.

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

documentation.text: @dev address of owner of tokens being airdropped.
@dev claim limit for open/public claiming without allowlist.
@dev merkle root of the allowlist of addresses eligible to claim.
@dev Mapping from address => total number of tokens a wallet has claimed.
@dev Initializes the contract, like a constructor.
@dev Checks a request to claim tokens against the active claim condition's criteria.
